Name: jon snow
Interaction: Go on. Father's watching.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: And which one of you was a marksman at ten? Keep practicing, Bran. Go on.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: Don't think too much, Bran.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: Relax your bow arm.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: Quick, Bran!

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Get the lads to saddle their horses.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Do you have to?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Tell Bran he's coming, too.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Ned. Ten is too young to see such things.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: He won't be a boy forever. And winter is coming.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon, first of his name …

Name: jon snow
Interaction: Don't look away.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: King of the Andals and the First Men …

Name: jon snow
Interaction: Father will know if you do.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and protector of the realm, I, Eddard of the House Stark, Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North, sentence you to die.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: You did well.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: A madman sees what he sees.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: It's a direwolf.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Tough old beast.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: There are no direwolves south of the Wall.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: Now there are five.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I'm sorry, Bran.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: Lord Stark? There are five pups. One for each of the Stark children. The direwolf is the sigil of your House. They were meant to have them.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: I'm not a Stark. Get on.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: As your brother, I feel it's my duty to warn you

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: And you never worry about anything. When we were seven, you jumped off the cliffs as Casterly Rock. One hundred foot drop into the water. And you were never afraid.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: There was nothing to be afraid of until you told father. [In a whisper, mimicking] We're Lannisters. Lannisters don't act like fools.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: What if Jon Arryn told someone?

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: But who would he tell?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: My husband.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: If he told the king, both our heads would be skewered on the city gates by now. Whatever Jon Arryn knew or didn't know, it died with him. And Robert will choose a new Hand of the king, someone to do his job while he's off fucking boars and hunting whores. Or is it the other way around? And life will go on.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: You should be the Hand of the king.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: That's an honor I can do without. Their days are too long, their lives are too short.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: All these years and I still feel like an outsider when I come here.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You have five northern children. You're not an outsider.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I wonder if the old gods agree.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: It's your gods with all the rules.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I am so sorry, my love.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Tell me.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: There was a raven from Kings Landing. Jon Arryn is dead. A fever took him. I know he was like a father to you.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Your sister. The boy …

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: They both have their health. Gods be good. [pause] The raven brought more news. The king rides for Winterfell. With the queen and all the rest of them.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: He's coming this far North, there's only one thing he's after.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: You can always say no, Ned.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: In any case, candles.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: Go on, Tommy, shave him good. He's never met a girl he likes better than his own hair.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: You always look at your feet before you lie. Run and find your father. Tell him the king is close.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Where's Arya? Sansa, where's your sister?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Your Grace.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: You've got fat.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Cat!

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Your Grace.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Nine years. Why haven't I seen you? Where the hell have you been?

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Will you shut up?

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Would you please shut up.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: My queen.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: My queen.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Take me to your crypt. I want to pay my respects.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: We've been riding for a month, my love. Surely the dead can wait.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Ned.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Where is our brother? Go find the little beast.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Tell me about Jon Arryn.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: One minute he was fine, and then … Burned right through him, whatever it was. I loved that man.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: We both did.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: He never had to teach you much, but me … You remember me at 16? All I wanted to do was crack skulls and fuck girls. He showed me what was what.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Aye.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Don't look at me like that. Not his fault I didn't listen. I need you, Ned. Down at Kings Landing. Not up here, where you're no damn use to anybody. Lord Eddard Stark, I would name you the Hand of the king.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I'm not worthy of the honor.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: I'm not trying to honor you. I'm trying to get you to run my kingdom while I eat, drink, and whore my way to an early grave. Damn it, Ned, stand up. You helped me win the Iron Throne, now help me keep the damn thing. We were meant to rule together. If your sister had lived, we would have been bound by blood. Well, it's not too late. I have a son, you have a daughter. We'll join our Houses.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Have you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: The gods gave me one blessing.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Should I explain to you the meaning of a closed door in a whorehouse, brother?

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: You've much to teach me, no doubt. But our sister craves your attention.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: She has odd cravings, our sister.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: A family trait. Now, the Starks are feasting us at sundown. Don't leave me alone with these people.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: I'm sorry, I've begun the feast a bit early. And this is the first of many courses.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: I thought you might say that. But since we're short on time, Come on, girls. See you at sundown.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Close the door!

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Did you have to bury her in a place like this? She should be on a hill somewhere with the sun and the clouds above her.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: She was my sister. This is where she belongs.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: She belonged with me.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: In my dreams, I kill him every night.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: It's done, Your Grace. The Targaryens are gone.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Not all of them.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: Daenerys!

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: Daenerys! There's our bride to be! Look – a gift from Illyrio. Touch it. Come on. Feel the fabric. Mmmm. Isn't he a gracious host?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: We've been his guests for over a year and he's never asked us for anything.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: Illyrio is no fool. He knows I won't forget my friends when I come into my throne. You still slouch. Let me see. You have a woman's body now. I need you to be perfect today. Can you do that for me? You don't want to wake the dragon, do you?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: No.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: I know how to play a man like Drogo. I give him a queen and he gives me an army.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: I don't want to be his queen. I want to go home.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: So do I. I want us both to go home. But they took it from us. So tell me, sweet sister, how do we go home?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: I don't know.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: We go home with an army. With Khal Drogo's army. I would let his whole tribe fuck you, all 40,000 men and their horses too, if that's what it took.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Do you think Joffrey will like me? What if he thinks I'm ugly?

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Then he is the stupidest prince that ever lived.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: He's so handsome.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: When would we be married? Soon or do we have to wait?

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Hush now. Your father hasn't even said yes.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Why would he say no? He'd be the second most powerful man in the kingdoms.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: He'd have to leave home. He'd have to leave me. And so would you.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: You left your home to come here. And I'd be queen someday. Please make father say yes.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Sansa…

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Please, please. It's the only thing I ever wanted.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Your uncle's in the Night's Watch.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: What're you doing back there?

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Preparing for a night with your family. I've always wanted to see the Wall.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: You're Tyrion Lannister. The queen's brother?

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: My greatest accomplishment. You – you're Ned Stark's bastard, aren't you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Did I offend you? Sorry. You are the bastard, though.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: Lord Eddard Stark is my father.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: And Lady Stark is not your mother. Making you a bastard. Let me give you some advice, bastard. Never forget what you are. The rest of the world will not. Wear it like armor. Then it can never be used to hurt you.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: What the hell do you know about being a bastard?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Winter is coming.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Is this your first time in the North, Your Grace?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Yes. Lovely country.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I'm sure it's very grim, after Kings Landing. I remember how scared I was when Ned brought me up here for the first time.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Hello, little dove. But you are a beauty. How old are you?

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Thirteen, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: You're tall. Still growing?

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: I think so, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: And have you bled yet?

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: No, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: And your dress. Did you make it?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Such talent. You must make something for me.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: I hear we might share a grandchild someday.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I hear the same.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Your daughter will do well in the capital. Such a beauty shouldn't stay hidden up here forever.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Your pardon.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: I hear we might be neighbors soon. I hope it's true.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Yes, the king has honored me with his offer.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: I'm sure we'll have a tournament to celebrate the new title, if you accept. It would be good to have you in the field. The competition has become a bit stale.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I don't fight in tournaments.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: No? Getting a little old for it?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I don't fight in tournaments because when I fight a man for real, I don't want him to know what I can do.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Well said.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Arya!

Name: robb stark
Interaction: Time for bed.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I'm a Northman. I belong here with you, not down south in that rat's nest they call a capital.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I won't let him take you.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: The king takes what he wants. That's why he's king.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I'll say, ‘Listen, fat man, you are not taking my husband anywhere. He belongs to me now.'

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: How did he get so fat?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Stay.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: This was sent from the Eyrie. What's she doing at the Eyrie? She hasn't been back there since her wedding.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: What news?

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: She's fled the capital. She says Jon Arryn was murdered. By the Lannisters. She says the king is in danger.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: She's fresh widowed, Cat. She doesn't know what she's saying.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: Thank you, Magister.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: Do you know the Common Tongue?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Are you as good with a spear as you used to be?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: No, but I'm still better than you.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: I know what I'm putting you through. Thank you for saying yes. I only ask you because I need you. You're a loyal friend. You hear me? A loyal friend. The last one I've got.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I hope I'll serve you well.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: You will. And I'll make sure you don't look so fucking grim all the time. Come on, boys, let's go kill some boar!

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Stop. STOP.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Are you completely mad?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: He saw us.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: It's all right. It's all right.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: He saw us!

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: The things I do for love.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: Under my reign, you won't be punished for such nonsense. You can rest assured of that.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: Better-looking bitches than you're used to, Uncle. My mother's been looking for you. We ride for King's Landing today.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Before you go, you will call on Lord and Lady Stark and offer your sympathies.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: What good will my sympathies do them?

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: None. But it is expected of you. Your absence has already been noted.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: The boy means nothing to me. And I can't stand the wailing of women.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: One word and I'll hit you again.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: I'm telling mother!

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Go! Tell her. But first you will get to Lord and Lady Stark and you will fall on your knees in front of them and tell them how very sorry you are, that you are at their service, and that all your prayers are with them. Do you understand?

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: You can't...

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: I hope so. If he forgets, be a good dog and remind him. Time for breakfast...

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Little brother.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Apparently not.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: What do you mean?

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: The Maester says the boy may live.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: It's no mercy, letting a child linger in such pain.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Only the gods know for certain. All the rest of us can do is pray. The charms of the north seem entirely lost on you.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: I still can't believe you're going. It's ridiculous even for you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Where's your sense of wonder? The greatest structure ever built, the intrepid men of the Night's Watch, the wintry abode of the White Walkers.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Tell me you're not thinking of taking the black.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: And go celibate? The whores would go begging from Dorne to Casterly Rock. I just want to stand on top of the Wall and piss off the edge of the world.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: The children don't need to hear your filth. Come.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Even if the boy lives, he'll be a cripple, a grotesque. Give me a good clean death any day.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Speaking for the grotesques, I'd have to disagree. Death is so final, whereas life... Life is full of possibilities. I hope the boy does wake. I'd be very interested to hear what he has to say.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: My dear brother, there are times you make me wonder whose side you're on.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: My dear brother, you wound me. You know how much I love my family.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Please.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I would have dressed, your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: This is your home. I'm your guest. Handsome one, isn't he? I lost my first boy, a little black-haired beauty. He was a fighter too... Tried to beat the fever that took him. Forgive me. It's the last thing you need to hear right now.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I never knew.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: It was years ago. Robert was crazed, beat his hands bloody on the wall, all the things men do to show you how much they care... The boy looked just like him. Such a little thing... A bird without feathers. They came to take his body away and Robert held me. I screamed and I battled, but he held me. That little bundle. They took him away and I never saw him again. Never have visited the crypt, never. I pray to the Mother every morning and night that she return your child to you.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I am grateful..

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Perhaps this time she'll listen.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: A sword for the wall?

Name: jon snow
Interaction: I already have one.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Good man. Have you swung it yet?

Name: jon snow
Interaction: Of course I have.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: At someone, I mean. It's a strange thing, the first time you cut a man. You realize we're nothing but sacks of meat and blood and some bone to keep it all standing. Let me thank you ahead of time for guarding us all from the perils beyond the Wall... Wildlings and White Walkers and whatnot. We're grateful to have good, strong men like you protecting us.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: We've guarded the Kingdoms for 8 000 years.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Is it "we" already? Have you taken your vows then?

Name: jon snow
Interaction: Soon enough.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Give my regards to the Night's Watch. I'm sure it will be thrilling to serve in such an elite force. And if not, It's only for life.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: I came to say goodbye to Bran.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: You've said it.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I want you to leave.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: 17 years ago you rode off with Robert Baratheon. You came back a year later with another woman's son. And now you're leaving again.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I have no choice.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: That's what men always say when honor calls. That's what you tell your families, tell yourselves. You do have a choice. And you've made it. I can't do it, Ned. I really can't.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You can. You must.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: You've said goodbye to Bran? He's not going to die. I know it.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: You Starks are hard to kill.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: My mother?

Name: jon snow
Interaction: She was very kind.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: Good. Next time I see you, you'll be all in black.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: It was always my color.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: Farewell, Snow.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: And you, Stark.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: There's great honor serving in the Night's Watch. The Starks have manned the Wall for thousands of years. And you are a Stark. You might not have my name, but you have my blood.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: Is my mother alive? Does she know about me? Where I am, where I'm going? Does she care?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: The next time we see each other, we'll talk about your mother. I promise.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Gods, this is country! I've half a mind to leave them all behind and keep going.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I've half a mind to go with you.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: What do you say, just you and me on the Kingsroad, swords at our sides, a couple of tavern wenches to warm our beds tonight.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You should have asked me 20 years ago.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: There were wars to fight, women to marry... We never had the chance to be young.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I recall a few chances.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: There was that one... Oh, what was her name? That common girl of yours? Becca? With the great big tits you could bury your face in.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Bessie. She was one of yours.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Bessie! Thank the gods for Bessie and her tits. Yours was... Aleena? No. You told me once. Meryl? Your bastardo s mother?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Wylla.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: That's it. She must have been a rare wench to make Lord Eddard Stark forget his honor. You never told me what she looked like.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Nor will I.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: We were at war. None of us knew if we were gonna go back home again. You're too hard on yourself. You always have been. I swear if I weren't your King, you'd have hit me already.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: The worst thing about your coronation... I'll never get to hit you again.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Trust me, that's not the worst thing. There was a rider in the night.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Daenerys Targaryen has wed some Dothraki horselord. What of it? Should we send her a wedding gift?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: A knife perhaps, a good sharp one, and a bold man to wield it.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: She's little more than a child.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Soon enough that child will spread her legs and start breeding.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Tell me we're not speaking of this.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Oh, it's unspeakable to you? What her father did to your family... That was unspeakable. What Rhaegar Targaryen did to your sister... the woman I loved. I'll kill every Targaryen I get my hands on.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: But you can't get your hands on this one, can you?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: This Khal Drogo, it's said he has 100,000 men in his horde.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Even a million Dothraki are no threat to the realm, as long as they remain on the other side of the Narrow Sea. They have no ships, Robert.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: There are still those in the Seven Kingdoms who call me Usurper. If the Targaryen boy crosses with a Dothraki horde at his back, the scum will join him.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: He will not cross. And if by chance he does, we'll throw him back into the sea.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: There's a war coming, Ned. I don't know when, I don't know who we'll be fighting, but it's coming.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Rapers. They were given a choice no doubt... Castration or the Wall. Most choose the knife. Not impressed by your new brothers? Lovely thing about the Watch... You discard your old family and get a whole new one.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: Why do you read so much?

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Look at me and tell me what you see.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: Is this a trick?

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: What you see is a dwarf. If I'd been born a peasant they might've left me out in the woods to die. Alas, I was born a Lannister of Casterly Rock. Things are expected of me. My father was the Hand of the King for 20 years.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: Until your brother killed that King.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Yes, until my brother killed him. Life is full of these little ironies. My sister married the new King and my repulsive nephew will be King after him. I must do my part for the honor of my house, wouldn't you agree? But how? Well, my brother has his sword and I have my mind. And a mind needs books like a sword needs a whetstone. That's why I read so much. And you? What's your story, bastard?

Name: jon snow
Interaction: Ask me nicely and maybe I'll tell you, dwarf.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: A bastard boy with nothing to inherit, off to join the ancient order of the Night's Watch, alongside his valiant brothers-in-arms.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: The Night's Watch protects the realm from...

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Yes yes, against grumpkins and snarks and all the other monsters your wet nurse warned you about. You're a smart boy. You don't believe that nonsense... Everything's better with some wine in the belly.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I don't care about appointments!

Name: robb stark
Interaction: When was the last time you left this room?

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I have to take care of him.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: He's not going to die, mother. Maester Luwin says the most dangerous time has passed.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: What if he's wrong? Bran needs me.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: Rickon needs you. He's six. He doesn't know what's happening. He follows me around all day, clutching my leg, crying...

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Close the windows! I can't stand it! Please make them stop!

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I don't trust a raven to carry these words.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: I'll ride to King's Landing.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: No. There must always be a Stark in Winterfell. I will go myself.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: Mother, you can't.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: What about Bran?

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I have prayed to the Seven for more than a month. Bran's life is in their hands now.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: He speaks damn well with his sword though. Ser Ilyn Payne, the King's justice. The royal executioner. What is it, sweet lady? Does the hound frighten you? Away with you, dog. You're scaring my lady. I don't like to see you upset. The sun is finally shining. Come walk with me.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Stay, Lady. I probably shouldn't have any more. Father only lets us have one cup at feasts.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Arya, stay out of this.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: I won't hurt him... Much. Filthy little bitch!

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: No no, stop it, stop it, both of you. You're spoiling it. You're spoiling everything!

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: Please don't.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Arya, leave him alone. My prince, my poor prince, look what they did to you. Stay here, I'll go back to the inn and bring help.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: It's all right. What is the meaning of this? Why was my daughter not brought to me at once?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: How dare you speak to your King in that manner?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Quiet, woman. Sorry, Ned. I never meant to frighten the girl. But we need to get this business done quickly.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: Shut up!

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Enough! He tells me one thing, she tells me another. Seven hells! What am I to make of this? Where's your other daughter, Ned?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: In bed asleep.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: She's not. Sansa, come here, darling.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Now, child... Tell me what happened. Tell it all and tell it true. It's a great crime to lie to a King.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Stop! Arya!

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: She's as wild as that animal of hers. I want her punished.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: What would you have me do, whip her through the streets? Damn it, children fight. It's over.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Joffrey will bear these scars for the rest of his life.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: You let that little girl disarm you? See to it that your daughter is disciplined. I'll do the same with my son.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Gladly, your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: And what of the direwolf? What of the beast that savaged your son?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: So be it.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: We have another wolf.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: As you will.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You can't mean it.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: A direwolf's no pet. Get her a dog. She'll be happier for it.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Stop them. Don't let them do it. Please! It wasn't Lady!

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Is this your command... your Grace?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Ser Ilyn, do me the honor.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: No. Jory... Take the girls to their rooms. If it must be done, then I'll do it myself.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Is this some trick?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: The wolf is of the north. She deserves better than a butcher.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Thank the gods you're here, Stark. About time we had some stern northern leadership.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Glad to see you're protecting the throne.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Sturdy old thing. How many kings' asses have polished it, I wonder? What's the line? The King shits and the Hand wipes.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Very handsome armor. Not a scratch on it.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: I know. People have been swinging at me for years, but they always seem to miss.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You've chosen your opponents wisely then.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: I have a knack for it. It must be strange for you coming into this room. I was standing right here when it happened. He was very brave, your brother. Your father too. They didn't deserve to die like that. Nobody deserves to die like that.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: But you just stood there and watched.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: 500 men just stood there and watched. All the great knights of the Seven Kingdoms. You think anyone said a word, lifted a finger? No, Lord Stark. 500 men and this room was silent as a crypt. Except for the screams, of course, and the Mad King laughing. And later... When I watched the Mad King die, I remembered him laughing as your father burned... It felt like justice.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Is that what you tell yourself at night? You're a servant of justice? That you were avenging my father when you shoved your sword in Aerys Targaryen's back?

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Tell me... If I'd stabbed the Mad King in the belly instead of the back, would you admire me more?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You served him well, when serving was safe.

Name: varys
Interaction: Lord Stark.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Lord Varys.

Name: varys
Interaction: I was grievously sorry to hear of your troubles on the Kingsroad. We are all praying for Prince Joffrey's full recovery.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: A shame you didn't say a prayer for the butcher's son. Renly! You're looking well.

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: And you look tired from the road. I told them this meeting could wait another day, but...

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: But we have a Kingdom to look after. I've hoped to meet you for some time, Lord Stark. No doubt Lady Catelyn has mentioned me.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: She has, Lord Baelish. I understand you knew my brother Brandon as well.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: All too well. I still carry a token of his esteem from navel to collarbone.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Perhaps you chose the wrong man to duel with.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Without the King?

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: Winter may be coming, but I'm afraid the same cannot be said for my brother.

Name: varys
Interaction: His Grace has many cares. He entrusts some small matters to us that we might lighten the load.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: We are the lords of small matters here.

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: My brother instructs us to stage a tournament in honor of Lord Stark's appointment as Hand of the King.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Mmm, how much?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: I'll have to borrow it. The Lannisters will accommodate, I expect. We already owe Lord Tywin 3 million gold. What's another 80,000?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Are you telling me the Crown is three million in debt?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: I'm telling you the Crown is six million in debt.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: How could you let this happen?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: The Master of Coin finds the money. The King and the Hand spend it.

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: Counting coppers," he calls it.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I'll speak to him tomorrow. This tournament is an extravagance we cannot afford.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: As you will. But still, we'd best make our plans.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: There will be no plans until I speak to Robert. Forgive me, my Lords. I had a long ride.

Name: varys
Interaction: You are the King's Hand, Lord Stark, we serve at your pleasure.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Please, it's nearly healed.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: It's ugly.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: A King should have scars, you fought off a direwolf. You're a warrior like your father.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: I'm not like him. I didn't fight off anything. It bit me and all I did was scream. And the two Stark girls saw it, both of them.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: That's not true. You killed the beast. You only spared the girl because of the love your father bears her father. When Aerys Targaryen sat on the Iron Throne, your father was a rebel and a traitor. Someday you'll sit on the throne and the truth will be what you make it.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: Do I have to marry her?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Yes. She's very beautiful and young. If you don't like her, you only need to see her on formal occasions and when the time comes, to make little princes and princesses. And if you'd rather fuck painted whores, you'll fuck painted whores. And if you'd rather lie with noble virgins, so be it. You are my darling boy and the world will be exactly as you want it to be. Do something nice for the Stark girl.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: I don't want to.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: No, but you will. The occasional kindness will spare you all sorts of trouble down the road.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: We allow the northerners too much power. They consider themselves our equals.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: How would you handle them?

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: I'd double their taxes and command them to supply 10,000 men to the royal army.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: A royal army?

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: Why should every lord command his own men? It's primitive, no better than the hill tribes. We should have a standing army of men loyal to the Crown, trained by experienced soldiers... Instead of a mob of peasants who've never held pikes in their lives.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: And if the northerners rebel?

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: I'd crush them. Seize Winterfell and install someone loyal to the realm as Warden of the North. Uncle Kevan, maybe.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: And these 10,000 northern troops, would they fight for you or their lord?

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: For me. I'm their King.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: But you've just invaded their homeland, asked them to kill their brothers.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: I'm not asking.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: The North cannot be held... not by an outsider. It's too big and too wild. When the winter comes, the Seven gods together couldn't save you and your royal army. A good King knows when to save his strength... And when to destroy his enemies.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: So you agree... The Starks are enemies?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Everyone who isn't us is an enemy.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Go to your room. We'll speak later. That's for you, love…

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: The same dollmaker makes all of Princess Myrcella's toys. Don't you like it?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: It's all right. Go on.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Cat! Go on. Go upstairs.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: You little worm! You take me for some back-alley Sally you can drag into a…

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: I meant no disrespect to you of all people.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: How dare you bring me here! Have you lost your mind?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: No one will come looking for you here. Isn't that what like you wanted? I'm truly sorry... about the locale.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: How did you know I was coming to King's Landing?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: A dear friend told me.

Name: varys
Interaction: Lady Stark.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Lord Varys.

Name: varys
Interaction: To see you again after so many years is a blessing. Your poor hands.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: How did you know I was coming?

Name: varys
Interaction: Knowledge is my trade, my Lady. Did you bring the dagger with you, by any chance? My little birds are everywhere. Even in the north. They whisper to me the strangest stories. Valyrian steel.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Do you know whose dagger this is?

Name: varys
Interaction: I must admit I do not.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Well well, this is an historic day. Something you don't know that I do. There's only one dagger like this in all of the Seven Kingdoms. It's mine.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Yours?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: At least it was, until the tournament on Prince Joffrey's last nameday. I bet on Ser Jaime in the jousting, as any sane man would. When the Knight of the Flowers unseated him, I lost this dagger.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: To whom?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Tyrion Lannister. The Imp.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Good news? Perhaps you'd like to share it with your wife?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: My wife is in Winterfell.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Is she?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: I thought that she'd be safest in here. One of several such establishments I own.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You're a funny man. A very funny man.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Ned! [poking her head out of a window]

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: The Starks... Quick tempers, slow minds.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: Everybody knew what this place was and no one told me. No one but you. My father knew and left me to rot here at the Wall all the same.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Grenn's father left him too... Outside a farmhouse when he was three. Pyp was caught stealing a wheel of cheese. His little sister hadn't eaten in three days. He was given a choice

Name: jon snow
Interaction: They hate me because I'm better than they are.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: It's a lucky thing none of them were trained by a master-at-arms like your Ser Rodrik. I don't imagine any of them have ever held a real sword before they came here. Your brother Bran. He's woken up.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: The mere suggestion that the Queen's brother tried to kill your boy would be considered treason.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: We have proof. We have the blade.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Which Lord Tyrion will say was stolen from him. The only man who could say otherwise has no throat, thanks to your boy's wolf.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Petyr has promised to help us find the truth. He's like a little brother to me. He would never betray my trust.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: I'll try to keep you alive, for her sake. A fool's task, admittedly, but I've never been able to refuse your wife anything.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I won't forget this. You're a true friend.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Don't tell anyone. I have a reputation to maintain.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: How could you be so stupid?

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Calm down.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: He's a child... 10 years old. What were you thinking?

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: I was thinking of us. You're a bit late to start complaining about it now. What has the boy told them?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Nothing. He's said nothing. He remembers nothing.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Then what are you raving about?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: What if it comes back to him? If he tells his father what he saw...

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: We'll say he was lying. We'll say he was dreaming. We'll say whatever we like. I think we can outfox a 10-year-old.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: And my husband?

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: I'll go to war with him if I have to. They can write a ballad about us

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Let me go.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Never.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: The boy won't talk. And if he does, I'll kill him. Him, Ned Stark, the King... the whole bloody lot of them, until you and I are the only people left in this world.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I wish I could see the girls.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: It's too dangerous.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Just for a moment.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Until we know who our enemies are...

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I know they did it, Ned. The Lannisters. In my bones, I know it.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Littlefinger's right. I can't do anything without proof.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: And if you find the proof?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Then I bring it to Robert... And hope he's still the man I once knew. You watch yourself on the road, huh? That temper of yours is a dangerous thing.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: My temper? Gods be good, you nearly killed poor Littlefinger yesterday.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: He still loves you.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Does he?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Off with you.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Is that what empty means?! So get more. Tell your cousin to get in here. Kingslayer! Get in here. Surrounded by Lannisters. Every time I close my eyes I see their blond hair and their smug, satisfied faces. It must wound your pride, huh? Standing out there like a glorified sentry. Jaime Lannister, son of the mighty Tywin... Forced to mind the door while your King eats and drinks and shits and fucks. So come on. We're telling war stories. Who was your first kill, not counting old men?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Your outlaw... Any last words?

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: I cut his head off, so no.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: What about Aerys Targaryen? What did the Mad King say when you stabbed him in the back? I never asked. Did he call you a traitor? Did he plead for a reprieve?

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: He said the same thing he'd been saying for hours... "Burn them all." If that's all, your Grace...

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: Not a Queen. A Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: Please please, don't hurt him. Tell him I don't want my brother harmed.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: I'm sorry to see you leave, Lannister.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: It's either me or this cold. And it doesn't appear to be going anywhere.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: Will you stop at Winterfell on your way South?

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: I expect I will. Gods know there aren't many feather beds between here and King's Landing.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: If you see my brother Bran, tell him I miss him. Tell him I'd visit if I could.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Of course.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: He'll never walk again.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: If you're going to be a cripple, it's better to be a rich cripple. Take care, Snow.

Name: jon snow
Interaction: Farewell, My Lord.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: I must say I received a slightly warmer welcome on my last visit.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: Any man of the Night's Watch is welcome at Winterfell.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Any man of the Night's Watch, but not I, eh, boy?

Name: robb stark
Interaction: I'm not your boy, Lannister. I'm Lord of Winterfell while my father is away.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Then you might learn a lordo s courtesy.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Curious.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: Why are you here?

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: You will. On horseback you will be as tall as any of them.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: Is this some kind of trick? Why do you want to help him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples, bastards and broken things.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: You've done my brother a kindness. The hospitality of Winterfell is yours.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: A pile of mud. Mud and shit and twigs - best these savages can do.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: These are my people now. You shouldn't call them savages.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: I'll call them what I like, because they're my people. This is my army. Khal Drogo is marching the wrong way with my army.

Name: varys
Interaction: Dreadful.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You'll get 50. Lord Baelish will see it paid for.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: I will?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: The sooner this is over, the better.

Name: varys
Interaction: The realm prospers from such events, my Lord. They give the great a chance at glory, and the lowly a respite from their woes.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: And every inn in the city is full and the whores are walking bow-legged.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: I hear you're reading a boring book.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Pycelle talks too much.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: He never stops. Do you know Ser Hugh of the Vale? Not surprising. Until recently, he was only a squire... Jon Arryn's squire. He was knighted almost immediately after his master's untimely death.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Knighted for what? Why are you telling me this?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: I promised Cat that I'd help you.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Where is Ser Hugh? I'll speak to him.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: A singularly bad idea. Do you see that boy there? One of Varys's little birds. The Spider has taken a great interest in your comings and goings. Now look there. That one belongs to the Queen. And do you see that Septa pretending to read her book?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Varys or the Queen?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: No. She's one of mine. Is there someone in your service whom you trust completely?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Yes.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: The wiser answer was no, my Lord. Get a message to this paragon of yours... Discreetly. Send him to question Ser Hugh. After that, you might want him to visit a certain armorer in the city. He lives in a large house at the top of the street of Steel.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: I have my observers, as I said, and it's possible that they saw Lord Arryn visit this armorer several times in the weeks before his death.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Lord Baelish, perhaps I was wrong to distrust you.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Distrusting me was the wisest thing you've done since you climbed off your horse.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: I doubt it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: Why did you hit her?!

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: How many times do I have to tell you? You do not command me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: I wasn't commanding you. I just wanted to invite you to supper.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: What's this?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: It's a gift. I had it made for you.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: Dothraki rags? Are you going to dress me now?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: Please.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: This stinks of manure. All of it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: Stop - stop it.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: You would turn me into one of them, wouldn't you? Next you'll want to braid my hair.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: You've no right to a braid. You've won no victories yet.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: You do not talk back to me!

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: You are a horselordo s slut. And now you've woken the dragon...

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: I am a Khaleesi of the Dothraki! I am the wife of the great Khal and I carry his son inside me. The next time you raise a hand to me will be the last time you have hands.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Lover's quarrel?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: No, it's quite all right. When I was a child I was very small and I come from a little spit of land called The Fingers, so you see, it's an exceedingly clever nickname.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: I've been sitting here for days! Start the damn joust before I piss myself!

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Gods, who is that?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Ser Gregor Clegane. They call him the Mountain. The Houndo s older brother.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: And his opponent?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Ser Hugh of the Vale. He was Jon Arryn's squire. Look how far he's come.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Yes, yes. Enough of the bloody pomp. Have at it!

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Not what you were expecting? Has anyone ever told you the story of the Mountain and the Hound? Lovely little tale of brotherly love. The Hound was just a pup, six years old maybe. Gregor a few years older, already a big lad, already getting a bit of a reputation. Some lucky boys just born with a talent for violence. One evening... Gregor found his little brother playing with a toy by the fire... Gregor's toy, a wooden knight. Gregor never said a word, he just grabbed his brother by the scruff of his neck and shoved his face into the burning coals. Held him there while the boy screamed, while his face melted. There aren't very many people who know that story.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: I won't tell anyone. I promise.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: No, please don't. If the Hound so much as heard you mention it, I'm afraid all the knights in King's Landing would not be able to save you.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: You're missing your tournament.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Putting my name on it doesn't make it mine.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: I thought we might put what happened on the Kingsroad behind us – the ugliness with the wolves. And forcing you to kill the beast was extreme. Though sometimes we go to extremes where our children are concerned. How is Sansa?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: She likes it here.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: The only Stark who does. Favors her mother, not much of the north in her.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: What are you doing here?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: I might ask the same of you. What is it you hope to accomplish?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: The King called on me to serve him and the realm, and that's what I'll do until he tells me otherwise.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: You can't change him. You can't help him. He'll do what he wants, which is all he's ever done. You'll try your best to pick up the pieces.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: If that's my job, then so be it.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: You're just a soldier, aren't you? You take your orders and you carry on. I suppose it makes sense. Your older brother was trained to lead and you were trained to follow.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I was also trained to kill my enemies, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: As was I.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: I envy your father all his fine friends, but I don't quite see the purpose of this.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Knight of House Frey

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: This man... Came into my house as a guest and there conspired to murder my son, a boy of 10. In the name of King Robert and the good Lords you serve, I call upon you to seize him and help me return him to Winterfell to await the king's justice.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Your mother was a dumb whore with a fat arse. Did you know that? Look at this idiot! One ball and no brains. He can't even put a man's armor on him properly.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You're too fat for your armor.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Fat? Fat, is it? Is that how you speak to your King? That was funny, is it?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: No? You don't like the Hando s joke?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You're torturing the poor boy.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: You heard the Hand. The King's too fat for his armor! Go find the breastplate stretcher, now!

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: The breastplate stretcher?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: How long before he figures it out?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Maybe you should have one invented.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: All right, all right. But you watch me out there. I still know how to point a lance.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You have no business jousting. Leave that for the young men.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Why? Because I'm king? Piss on that. I want to hit somebody!

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: And who's going to hit you back?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Anybody who can. And the last man in his saddle... will be you!

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: There's not a man in the Seven Kingdoms would risk hurting you.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Are you telling me those cowards would let me win?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Aye.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Drink.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I'm not thirsty.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Drink. Your King commands it. Gods! Too fat for my armor.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Your squire... A Lannister boy?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Hmm... A bloody idiot... But Cersei insisted. I have Jon Arryn to thank for her. "Cersei Lannister will make a good match", he told me. "You'll need her father on your side." I thought being King meant I could do whatever I wanted. Enough of this! Let's go watch 'em ride. At least I can smell someone else's blood.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Robert?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: What? Oh! An inspiring sight for the people, eh? Come! Bow before your King! Bow, you shits!

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Where's Arya

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: At her dancing lessons. The Knight of the Flowers.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Thank you, Ser Loras.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Don't let Ser Gregor hurt him.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Hey.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: I can't watch.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: 100 gold dragons on the Mountain.

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: I'll take that bet.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Now what will I buy with 100 gold dragons? A dozen barrels of Dornish wine? Or a girl from the pleasure houses of Lys?

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: Or you could even buy a friend.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: He's going to die.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Ser Loras rides well.

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: Such a shame, Littlefinger. It would have been so nice for you to have a friend.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: And tell me, Lord Renly, when will you be having your friend?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Loras knew his mare was in heat. Quite crafty, really.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Ser Loras would never do that! There's no honor in tricks.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: No honor but quite a bit of gold.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: This isn't the Kingsroad. You said we were riding for Winterfell.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I did... often and loudly.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Very wise. They'll be out in droves, looking for me in the wrong place. Wordo s probably gotten to my father by now. He'll be offering a handsome reward. Everyone knows a Lannister always pays his debts. Would you be so good as to untie me?

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: And why would I do that?

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Why not? Am I going to run? The hill tribes would kill me for my boots. Unless a Shadowcat ate me first.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Shadowcats and hill tribes are the least of your concerns.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Ah... the Eastern Road. We're going to The Vale. You're taking me to your sister's to answer for my imagined crimes. Tell me, Lady Stark. When was the last time you saw your sister?

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Five years ago.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: She's changed. She was always a bit touched, but now... you might as well kill me here.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: I am not a murderer, Lannister.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Neither am I! I had nothing to do with the attempt on your son's life!

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: The dagger found

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Untie me. If I die, what's the point?

Name: varys
Interaction: How is your son, my Lord?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: He'll never walk again.

Name: varys
Interaction: But his mind is sound?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: So they say.

Name: varys
Interaction: A blessing then. I suffered an early mutilation myself. Some doors close forever... others open in the most unexpected places. May I?

Name: varys
Interaction: If the wrong ears heard what I'm about to tell you, off comes my head. And who would mourn poor Varys then? North or South, they sing no songs for spiders. But there are things you must know. You are the King's Hand and the King is a fool... your friend, I know, but a fool... and doomed unless you save him.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I've been in the capital a month. Why have you waited so long to tell me this?

Name: varys
Interaction: I didn't trust you.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: So why do you trust me now?

Name: varys
Interaction: The Queen is not the only one who has been watching you closely. There are few men of honor in the capital. You are one of them. I would like to believe I am another, strange as that may seem.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: What sort of doom does the King face?

Name: varys
Interaction: The same sort as Jon Arryn. The tears of Lys, they call it. A rare and costly thing, as clear and tasteless as water. It leaves no trace.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Who gave it to him?

Name: varys
Interaction: Some dear friend, no doubt. But which one? There were many. Lord Arryn was a kind and trusting man. There was one boy... all he was he owed to Jon Arryn.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: The squire, Ser Hugh?

Name: varys
Interaction: Pity what happened to him, just when his life seemed to be going so nicely.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: If Ser Hugh poisoned him, who paid Ser Hugh?

Name: varys
Interaction: Someone who could afford it.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Jon was a man of peace. He was Hand for 17 years -- 17 good years. Why kill him?

Name: varys
Interaction: He started asking questions.

Name: varys
Interaction: The first to arrive and the last to leave. I admire your industry.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: You do move quietly.

Name: varys
Interaction: We all have our qualities.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: You look a bit lonely today. You should pay a visit to my brothel this evening. First boy is on the house.

Name: varys
Interaction: I think you're mistaking business with pleasure.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Am I? All those birds that whisper in your ear, such pretty little things. Trust me, we accommodate all inclinations.

Name: varys
Interaction: Oh, I'm sure. Lord Redwyne likes his boys very young, I hear.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: I'm a purveyor of beauty and discretion, both equally important.

Name: varys
Interaction: Though I suppose beauty is a subjective quality, no? Is it true that Ser Marlon of Tumblestone prefers amputees?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: All desires are valid to a man with a full purse.

Name: varys
Interaction: And I heard the most awful rumor about a certain lord with a taste for fresh cadavers. Must be enormously difficult to accommodate that inclination. The logistics alone... to find beautiful corpses before they rot.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Strictly speaking, such a thing would not be in accordance with the King's laws.

Name: varys
Interaction: Strictly speaking.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Tell me. Does someone, somewhere, keep your balls in a little box? I've often wondered.

Name: varys
Interaction: Do you know, I have no idea where they are? And we had been so close. But enough about me. How have you been since we last saw each other?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Since you last saw me or since I last saw you?

Name: varys
Interaction: Now the last time I saw you, you were talking to the Hand of the King.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Saw me with your own eyes?

Name: varys
Interaction: Eyes I own.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Council business. We all have so much to discuss with Ned Stark.

Name: varys
Interaction: Everyone's well aware of your enduring fondness for Lord Stark's wife. If the Lannisters were behind the attempt on the Stark boy's life and it was discovered that you helped the Starks come to that conclusion... To think... A simple word to the Queen...

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: One shudders at the thought.

Name: varys
Interaction: Oh.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: But you know something? I do believe that I have seen you even more recently than you have seen me.

Name: varys
Interaction: Have you?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Yes. Earlier today, I distinctly recall seeing you talking to Lord Stark in his chambers.

Name: varys
Interaction: Was that you under the bed?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: And not long after that when I saw you escorting a certain foreign dignitary... Council business? Of course you would have friends from across The Narrow Sea. You're from there yourself, after all. We're friends, aren't we, Lord Varys? I'd like to think we are. So you can imagine my burden, wondering if the King might question my friendo s sympathies… To stand at a crossroads where turning left means loyalty to a friend, turning right, loyalty to the realm.

Name: varys
Interaction: Oh, please.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: To find myself in a position where a simple word to the King --

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: What are you two conspiring about? Well, whatever it is, you'd best hurry up. My brother is coming.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: To a small council meeting?

Name: varys
Interaction: Disturbing news from far away. Haven't you heard?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Go on. We'll talk more later.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: The whore is pregnant.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You're speaking of murdering a child.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: I warned you this would happen. Back in the North, I warned you, but you didn't care to hear. Well, hear it now. I want 'em dead, mother and child both. And that fool, Viserys as well. Is that plain enough for you? I want them both dead.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You will dishonor yourself forever if you do this.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Honor?! I've got Seven Kingdoms to rule! One King, Seven Kingdoms. Do you think honor keeps them in line? Do you think it's honor that's keeping the peace? It's fear! Fear and blood!

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Then we're no better than the Mad King.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Careful, Ned. Careful now.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You want to assassinate a girl... Because the Spider heard a rumor?

Name: varys
Interaction: No rumor, my Lord. The princess is with child.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Based on whose information?

Name: varys
Interaction: Ser Jorah Mormont. He is serving as adviser to the Targaryens.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Mormont? You bring us the whispers of a traitor half a world away and call it fact?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Jorah Mormont's a slaver, not a traitor. Small difference, I know, to an honorable man.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: He broke the law, betrayed his family, fled our land. We commit murder on the word of this man?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: And if he's right? If she has a son? A Targaryen at the head of a Dothraki army… What then?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: The Narrow Sea still lies between us. I'll fear the Dothraki the day they teach their horses to run on water.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Do nothing? That's your wise advice? Do nothing til our enemies are on our shores? You're my council? Counsel! Speak sense to this honorable fool.

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: We should have had them both killed years ago.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: When you find yourself in bed with an ugly woman, best close your eyes, get it over with. Cut her throat. Be done with it.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I followed you into war - twice, without doubts, without second thoughts. But I will not follow you now. The Robert I grew up with didn't tremble at the shadow of an unborn child.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: She dies.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I will have no part in it.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: You're the King's Hand, Lord Stark. You'll do as I command or I'll find me a Hand who will.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: And good luck to him. I thought you were a better man.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Out! Out, damn you! I'm done with you. Go! Run back to Winterfell! I'll have your head on a spike! I'll put it there myself, you fool! You think you're too good for this? Too proud and honorable? This is a war!

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I'll go ahead with my daughters. Get them ready. Do it yourself. Don't ask anyone for help.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: His Grace went on about you at some length after you took your leave. The word "treason" was mentioned.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: What can I do for you?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: When do you return to Winterfell?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Why? What do you care?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: If you're still here come nightfall, I'll take you to see the last person Jon Arryn spoke with before falling ill. If that sort of thing still interests you.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I don't have the time.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: It won't take more than an hour. But as you please.

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: He's still my older brother.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: I'm sorry your marriage to Ned Stark didn't work out. You seemed so good together.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: I'm glad I could do something to make you happy.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Without a Hand, everything will fall to pieces.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: I suppose this is where you tell me to give the job to your brother Jaime.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: No. He's not serious enough. I'll say this for Ned Stark - he's serious enough. Was it really worth it? Losing him this way?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: I don't know. But I do know this, if the Targaryen girl convinces her horse-lord husband to invade and the Dothraki horde crosses The Narrow Sea... We won't be able to stop them.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: The Dothraki don't sail. Every child knows that. They don't have discipline. They don't have armor. They don't have siege weapons.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: It's a neat little trick you do, you move your lips and your father's voice comes out.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Is my father wrong?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Let's say Viserys Targaryen lands with forty thousand Dothraki screamers at his back. We hole up in our castles, a wise move. Only a fool would meet the Dothraki in an open field. They leave us in our castles. They go from town to town, looting and burning, killing every man who can't hide behind a stone wall, stealing all our crops and livestock, enslaving all our women and children. How long do the people of the Seven Kingdoms stand behind their absentee King, their cowardly King hiding behind high walls? When do the people decide that Viserys Targaryen is the rightful monarch after all.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: We still outnumber them.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Which is the bigger number -- five or one?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Five.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Five... one. One army, a real army, united behind one leader with one purpose. Our purpose died with the Mad King. Now we've got as many armies as there are men with gold in their purse. And everybody wants something different. Your father wants to own the world. Ned Stark wants to run away and bury his head in the snow.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: What do you want?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: We haven't had a real fight in nine years. Back-stabbing doesn't prepare you for a fight. And that's all the realm is now, back-stabbing and scheming and arse-licking and money-grubbing. Sometimes I don't know what holds it together.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Our marriage.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Ah, so here we sit, seventeen years later, holding it all together. Don't you get tired?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Every day.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: How long can hate hold a thing together?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Well, seventeen years is quite a long time.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Yes, it is.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Yes, it tis. What was she like?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: You've never asked about her, not once. Why not?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: At first, just saying her name, even in private felt like I was breathing life back into her. I thought if I didn't talk about her, she'd just fade away for you. When I realized that wasn't going to happen, I refused to ask out of spite. I didn't want to give you the satisfaction of thinking I cared enough to ask. And eventually it became clear that my spite didn't mean anything to you, as far as I could tell, you actually enjoyed it.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: So why now?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: What harm could Lyanna Stark's ghost do to either of us that we haven't done to each other a hundred times over?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: You want to know the horrible truth? I can't even remember what she looked like. I only know she was the one thing I ever wanted... Someone took her away from me, and Seven Kingdoms couldn't fill the hole she left behind.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: I felt something for you once, you know?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: I know.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Even after we lost our first boy -- for quite a while, actually. Was it ever possible for us? Was there ever a time, ever a... moment?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: No. Does that make you feel better or worse?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: It doesn't make me feel anything.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: She looks healthy enough to me. The girl shall want for nothing.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Brothels make a much better investment than ship, I've found. Whores rarely sink.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: What do you know of King Robert's bastards?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Well, he has more than you, for a start.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: How many?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Does it matter? If you fuck enough women, some of them will give you presents.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: And Jon Arryn tracked them all down. Why?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: He was the King's Hand. Perhaps Robert wanted them looked after. He was overcome with fatherly love.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Come.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Was!... the Hand of the King. Now I'm not sure what he is... Lord of somewhere very far away.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: What's the meaning of this, Lannister?

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Get back inside where it's safe. I'm looking for my brother. You remember my brother, don't you, Lord Stark? Blond hair, sharp tongue, short man.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I remember him well.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: It seems he had some trouble on the road. You wouldn't know what happened to him, would you?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: He was taken at my command to answer for his crimes.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: My Lords! I'll bring the City Watch!

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Threaten? As in, "I'm going to open your Lord from balls to brains and see what Starks are made of”?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You kill me, your brother's a dead man.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: You're right. Take him alive! Kill his men!

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: My brother, Lord Stark... We want him back.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Your pardon, your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Do you know what your wife has done?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: She did nothing I did not command.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Who'd have thought she had it in her?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: By what right dare you lay hands on my blood?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I am the King's Hand -

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: You were the King's Hand!

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: trying to keep the peace -

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: You shall now be held accountable.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Oh, will both of you shut your mouths? Catelyn will release Tyrion and you'll make your peace with Jaime.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: He butchered my men.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Lord Stark was returning drunk from a brothel when his men attacked Jaime.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Quiet, woman.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Jaime has fled the city. Give me leave to bring him back to justice.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: I took you for a king.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Hold your tongue.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: He's attacked my brother and abducted the other. I should wear the armor and you the gown.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: I shall wear this like a badge of honor.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Wear it in silence or I'll honor you again.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: See what she does to me? My loving wife. I should not have hit her. That was not… That was not kingly.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: If we don't act… there will be a war.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: So tell your wife to return that little shit of an Imp to King's Landing. She's had her fun, now put an end to it. You hear me? Send a raven and put an end to it.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: And what about Jaime Lannister? What about Jaime?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: I'm half a kingdom in debt to his bloody father. I don't know what happened between you and those yellow-haired shits. I don't want to know. This is what matters - I can't rule the kingdoms if the Starks and the Lannisters are at each other's throats, so enough!

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: As you command your Grace. With your leave, I will return to Winterfell and set matters straight.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Piss on that! Send a raven. I want you to stay. I'm the king, I get what I want… I never loved my brothers. A sad thing for a man to admit, but it's true. You were the brother I chose. We'll talk when I return from the hunt.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: The hunt?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Killing things clears my head. You'll have to sit on the throne while I'm away. You'll hate it more than I do.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: The Targaryen girl -

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Seven hells! Don't start with her again! The girl will die and I'll hear no more of it. Put on the badge. And if you ever take it off again, I swear to the Mother I'll pin the damn thing on Jaime Lannister.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: And it's not your duty, because it's not your House.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: She'll never keep it down.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: A prince rides inside me! And he shall be called Rhaego!

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: About the gold -

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Confessing my crimes.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Lord Tyrion, you are accused of hiring a man to slay my son Bran in his bed, and of conspiring to murder my sister's husband; Lord Jon Arryn, the Hand of the King.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Do I have a volunteer?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Oh, what was I saying?

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: A simpler time.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: The enemy was right there in the open, vicious as you like, all but sending you a bloody invitation. Nothing like today.

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: Sounds exhilarating.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Exhilarating, yes. Not as exhilarating as those balls and masquerades you like to throw. You ever fucked a Riverlands girl?

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: Once, I think.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: You think? I think you'd remember. Back in our day, you weren't a real man until you fucked a girl from each of the Seven Kingdoms and the Riverlands. We called it “making the eight.”

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: Those were some lucky girls.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Those were the days!

Name: renly baratheon
