Interaction: What days were those? The ones where half of Westeros fought the other half and millions died? Or before that, when the Mad King slaughtered women and babies because the voices in his head told him they deserved it? Or way before that when dragons burned whole cities to the ground?

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Easy, boy. You might be my brother, but you're speaking to the King.

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: I suppose it was all rather heroic. If you were drunk enough and had some poor Riverlands whore to shove your price inside and “make the eight.”

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Fish. The sigil of House Tully. Isn't that your wife's House - Tully - my Lord Hand?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: That sounds like someone we know. The Mountain.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I cannot give you back your homes or restore your dead to life. But perhaps I can give you justice in the name of our king, Robert. Lord Beric Dondarrion.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Send a raven to Casterly Rock. Inform Tywin Lannister that he has been summoned to court to answer for the crimes of his bannermen. He will arrive within the fortnight, or be branded an enemy of the crown and a traitor to the realm.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: A bold move, my Lord, and admirable. But is it wise to yank the lion's tail? Tywin Lannister is the richest man in all the Seven Kingdoms. Gold wins wars, not soldiers.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Then how come Robert is king and not Tywin Lannister?

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Not this little man. This little man is going home. I believe you have something of mine.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: My prince.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: My lady. I fear I have behaved monstrously the past few weeks. With your permission?

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: It's beautiful. Like the one your mother wears.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: You'll be queen one day, it's only fitting that you should look the part. Will you forgive me for my rudeness?

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: There's nothing to forgive.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: You're my lady. One day we'll be married in the throne room. Lords and ladies from all over the Seven Kingdoms will come, from the last hearth in the North, to the salt shore of the south. And you will be queen over all of them. I'll never disrespect you again. I'll never be cruel to you again. Do you understand me? You're my lady now, from this day, until my last day.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I'm sending you both back to Winterfell.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: What?!

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Listen -

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: What? No.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: When you're old enough, I'll make you a match with someone who's worthy of you, someone who's brave and gentle and strong -

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: He is not. He's nothing like that old drunk king.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Go on, girls. Get your septa and start packing your things.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: It's not fair!

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Lord Orys Baratheon, black of hair.” “Axel Baratheon, black of hair.” “Lyonel Baratheon, black of hair.” “Steffon Baratheon, black of hair.” “Robert Baratheon, black of hair.” “Joffrey Baratheon… golden-haired.”

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: Daenerys! Where's my sister?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: Stop him.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: Get your hands off me! No one touches the dragon!

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: Keep away from me!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: Viserys, please.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: They can't kill us. They can't shed blood in their sacred city. But I can. I want what I came for. I want the crown he promised me. He bought you. But he never paid for you.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: Tell him I want what was bargained for or I'm taking you back. He can keep the baby. I'll cut it out and leave it for him.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: What's he saying?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: He says yes. You shall have a golden crown, that men shall tremble to behold.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: That was all I wanted. W-what was promised.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: No.

Name: viserys targaryen
Interaction: No. Dany! Dany, tell them, make them! You can't!

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Summoned to court to answer for the crimes of your bannerman Gregor Clegane, the Mountain

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: Attacking him was stupid.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: Lannisters don't act like fools.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Catelyn Stark took my brother.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: Why is he still alive?

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Tyrion?

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: Ned Stark.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: One of our men interfered, speared him through the leg before I could finish him.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: It wouldn't have been clean.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: Clean...

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: You spend too much time worrying about what other people think of you.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: I could care less what anyone thinks of me.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: Now that's what you want people to think of you.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: It's the truth.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: When you hear them whispering "Kingslayer" behind your back, doesn't it bother you?

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Of course it bothers me.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: The lion doesn't concern himself with the opinions of the sheep.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: I didn't realize you placed such a high value on my brother's life.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: He's a Lannister. He might be the lowest of the Lannisters, but he's one of us.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: So the lion does concern himself with the opinions of..

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: No, it's not an opinion, it's a fact!

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: Hmm.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: You're in pain.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I've had worse, my lady.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Perhaps it's time to go home.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: The South doesn't seem to agree with you.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I know the truth Jon Arryn died for.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Do you, Lord Stark? Is that why you called me here, to pose me riddles?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Has he done this before?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Jaime would have killed him.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: My brother is worth a thousand of your friend.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Your brother Or your lover?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: The Targaryens wed brothers and sisters for 300 years to keep bloodlines pure.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Jaime and I are more than brother and sister. We shared a womb. We came into this world together. We belong together.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: My son saw you with him.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Do you love your children?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: With all my heart.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: No more than I love mine.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: And they are all Jaime's.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Thank the Gods.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You've always hated him.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Hated him? I worshiped him.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: When the King returns from his hunt, I'll tell him the truth.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: And what of my wrath, Lord Stark? You should have taken the realm for yourself.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I've made many mistakes in my life, but that wasn't one of them.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Oh, but it was.

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: Ned! It's Robert.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: I should have spent more time with you, shown you how to be a man.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: My fault. Too much wine, missed my thrust.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Robert, my sweet...

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Out, all of you!

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You damned fool.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Paper and ink on the table, write down what I say.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: Give it to the council after I'm dead.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I will.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: And my son Help him, Ned. Make him better than me.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I'll, I'll do everything I can to honor your memory.

Name: robert baratheon
Interaction: My memory.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: No man could have protected him from himself.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: His squire? The Lannister boy?

Name: varys
Interaction: Such a dutiful boy to make sure his Grace did not lack refreshment.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: His Grace has had a change of heart concerning Daenerys Targaryen.

Name: varys
Interaction: I'm afraid those birds have flown.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: It's not a chair. It's a...

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: She won't care.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: And what should I do with a hundred swords?

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: Strike! Tonight while the castle sleeps.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: What about Stannis?

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: Saving the Seven Kingdoms from Cersei and delivering them to Stannis?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Stannis is your older brother.

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: This isn't about the bloody line of succession.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Stannis is a commander. He's led men into war twice.

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: Yes, he's a good soldier. Everyone knows that. So was Robert.

Name: renly baratheon
Interaction: Do you still believe good soldiers make good kings?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I will not dishonor Robert's last hours by shedding blood in his halls and dragging frightened children from their beds.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: My Lord protector.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: The King has no true born sons.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: So when the King dies...

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: The throne passes to his brother Lord Stannis.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: So it would seem. Unless...

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: There is no "unless".

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: And he cannot take the throne without your help.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Do you have a shred of honor?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: You are now Hand of the King and Protector of the Realm.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: We?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: You'll need someone to share these burdens. I assure you, my price would be modest.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: What you suggest is treason.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Only if we lose.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Make peace with the Lannisters, you say. With the people who tried to murder my boy..

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: No. I won't do it.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: So it will be Stannis and war?

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: There is no other choice. He is the heir.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: So why did you call me here? Not for my wisdom, clearly.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You promised Catelyn you would help me.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Look at you. You know what you want me to do.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: I thought he'd leave me alone, now that my brother is gone.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: Liar!

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: You condemn yourself with your own mouth, Lord Stark.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Ser Barristan is a good man, a loyal man. Do him no harm.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: You think he stands alone?

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: Kill him! Kill all of them, I command it!

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: I want no bloodshed.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Now!

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: I did warn you not to trust me.

Name: varys
Interaction: Lord Stark, you must be thirsty.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Varys.

Name: varys
Interaction: I promise you it isn't poisoned.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: What about my daughters?

Name: varys
Interaction: The younger one seems to have escaped the castle.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: And Sansa?

Name: varys
Interaction: Still engaged to Joffrey.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You watched my men being slaughtered and did nothing.

Name: varys
Interaction: And would again, My Lord.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: The madness of mercy. That she might save her children.

Name: varys
Interaction: Ah, the children. It is always the innocents who suffer.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: The Queen can't kill me. Cat holds her brother.

Name: varys
Interaction: The wrong brother sadly.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: If that's true, then slit my throat and be done with it.

Name: varys
Interaction: Not today, My Lord.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Tell me something, Varys.

Name: varys
Interaction: The Realm, My Lord.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: He wouldn't do that. He knows how much I love Joffrey.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: No, I'm not.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: The girl is innocent, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Little dove, you must write to Lady Catelyn and your brother, the eldest.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Robb.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Word of your father's arrest will reach him soon, no doubt.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: If...if I could see my father, talk to him about...

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: You disappoint me, child.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: I only meant that...what will happen to him?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: That depends.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: On...on what?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: On your brother. And on you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Uncle. Father.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: The rumors of your demise were unfounded.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Sorry to disappoint you.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: And who are these Companions of yours?

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: May I present My Lord Father, Tywin son of Tytos of House Lannister.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: You left us no choice. The honor of the House was at stake.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: We have our differences, Jaime and I.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: And the Starks? Lord Eddard?

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: Is our hostage.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: How did my sweet sister persuade the King to imprison his dear friend Ned?

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: Robert Baratheon is dead.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: A green boy.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: My father understands mercy, when there is room for it.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Robb.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: You call me boy again.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Whose death, Ser Barristan? Yours or your King's?

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Careful, Ser.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Do you have some business for the King and the Council, Sansa?

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: I do.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: Let her speak.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Thank you, Your Grace.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Do you deny your father's crime?

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: No, My Lords. I know he must be punished.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: He said I wasn't the King. Why did he say that?

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: He was badly hurt.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: Anything else?

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: If you still have any affection in your heart for me, please do me this kindness, Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: Your sweet words have moved me.

Name: varys
Interaction: You've seen better days, my lord.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Another visit? lt seems you're my last friend.

Name: varys
Interaction: No, no, many still love you. Sansa came to court this morning to plead for your life.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: On her knees begging for me. Hm! Did you laugh with the others?

Name: varys
Interaction: You do me wrong, my lord. Your blood is the last thing l want.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: l don't know what you want. l've given up trying to guess.

Name: varys
Interaction: When l was still a boy - before they cut my balls off with a hot knife - l traveled with a group of actors through the free cities. They taught me that each man has a role to play. The same is true at court. l am the master of whisperers. My role is to be sly, obsequious and without scruples. l'm a good actor, my lord.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Huh. Can you free me from this pit?

Name: varys
Interaction: l could. But will l? No. As l said, I'm no hero.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: What do you want? Tell me. No riddles, no stories. Tell me, what do you want?

Name: varys
Interaction: Peace. Did you know that your son is marching south with an army of Northmen? Loyal lad. Fighting for his father's freedom.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Robb? He's just a boy.

Name: varys
Interaction: Boys have been conquerors before. But the man giving Cersei sleepless nights is the king's the late king's brother. Lord Stannis has the best claim to the throne. He is a proven battle commander and he is utterly without mercy.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: Stannis Baratheon is Robert's true heir. The throne is his by rights.

Name: varys
Interaction: Sansa pleaded so sweetly for your life. lt would be a shame to throw it away. Cersei is no fool. She knows a tame wolf is more use to her than a dead one.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You want me to serve the woman who murdered my king, who butchered my men, who crippled my son?

Name: varys
Interaction: l want you to serve the realm! Tell the queen you will confess your vile treason, tell your son to lay down his sword and proclaim Joffrey as the true heir. Cersei knows you as a man of honor. lf you give her the peace she needs, and promise to carry her secret to your grave, l believe she will allow you to take the black and live out your days on the Wall with your brother and your bastard son.

Name: eddard stark
Interaction: You think my life is some precious thing to me? That l would trade my honor for a few more years of... of what? You grew up with actors. You learned their craft and you learnt it well. But l grew up with soldiers. l learned how to die a long time ago.

Name: varys
Interaction: Pity. Such a pity. What of your daughter's life, my lord? ls that a precious thing to you?

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Keep shooting them down. We can't risk Lord Walder sending word of your movements to the Lannisters.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: The Freys have held the crossing for 600 years, and for 600 years they have never failed to exact their toll.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: My father would do whatever it took to secure our crossing. Whatever it took. lf l'm going to lead this army, l can't have other men doing my bargaining for me.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: Well? What did he say?

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Lord Walder has granted your crossing. His men are yours, as well.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: Huh.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Less the 400 he will keep here to hold the crossing against any who would pursue you.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: What does he want in return?

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: You will be taking on his son Olyvar as your personal squire. He expects a knighthood in good time.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: Fine, fine. And?

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: And Arya will marry his son Waldron when they both come of age.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: She won't be happy about that. And?

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: And when the fighting is done you will marry one of his daughters. Whichever you prefer. He has a number he thinks will be suitable.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: l see. Did you get a look at his daughters?

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: l did.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: And?

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: One was – Do you consent?

Name: robb stark
Interaction: Can l refuse?

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Not if you want to cross.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: Then l consent.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: The boy may lack experience and sense, but he does have a certain mindless provincial courage.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Oh, do continue. Didn't mean to interrupt.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Shagga likes axes.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: When the battle commences, you and your wildlings will be in the vanguard.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Ferocious? Last night a Moon Brother stabbed a Stone Crow over a sausage. Three Stone Crows seized the Moon Brother and opened his throat. Bronn managed to keep Shagga from chopping off the dead man's cock, which was fortunate, but even still, Ulf is demanding blood money, which Shagga and Gunthor refuse to pay.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: When soldiers lack discipline, the fault lies with their commander.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Surely there are ways to have me killed that would be less detrimental to the war effort.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: There'll be no more discussion on the matter.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: lt appears l'm not hungry after all. Excuse me, my lords.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: No one will enter.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: Bring him back to me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: All right. Your father left the family when you were very young, never to return.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: So, specifics… You wanted to be elsewhere, but how would you get there? l don't believe the life of the Silent Sisters is for you. So, what's a lowborn girl to do?

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: lt's nice to see them getting along.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: You're wounded.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Good of you to notice. l hear we won.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: Huh! The scouts were wrong. There were 2,000 Stark bannermen, not 20 [thousand].

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Did we get the Stark boy, at least?

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: He wasn't here.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Where was he?

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: With his other 18,000 men.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: And where are they?

Name: robb stark
Interaction: By the time they knew what was happening, it had already happened.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Lady Stark. l'd offer you my sword, but l seem to have lost it.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: lt is not your sword l want. Give me my daughters back. Give me my husband.

Name: robb stark
Interaction: He's more use to us alive than dead.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Take him away and put him in irons.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: We could end this war right now, boy, save thousands of lives. You fight for the Starks, l fight for the Lannisters. Swords or lances, teeth, nails - choose your weapons and let's end this here and now.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: My mother wishes me to let Lord Eddard join The Night's Watch. Stripped of all titles and powers, he would serve the realm in permanent exile. And My Lady Sansa has begged mercy for her father. But they have the soft hearts of women. So long as I am your King, treason shall never go unpunished. Ser Ilyn, bring me his head!

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: No, stop! Please, someone stop him!

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: My son, this is madness.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Robb. Robb! You've ruined your sword.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Shh! Shh! Shh!

Name: robb stark
Interaction: l'll kill them all. Every one of them. l will kill them all.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: My boy. They have your sisters. We have to get the girls back. And then we will kill them all.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: You look quite nice.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Thank you, my lord.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: And as soon as you've had your blood, l'll put a son in you. Mother says that shouldn't be long.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: No! Please, no!

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: This one's your father. This one here. Look at it and see what happens to traitors.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: You promised to be merciful.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: l was. l gave him a clean death. Look at him.

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: Please let me go home. l won't do any treason, l swear –

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: Mother says l'm still to marry you. So you'll stay here, and obey. Look at him!

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: Well?

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: How long do l have to look?

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: As long as it pleases me. Do you want to see the rest?

Name: sansa stark
Interaction: lf it please Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: That's your Septa there. l'll tell you what, l'm going to give you a present. After l raise my armies and kill your traitor brother, l'm going to give you his head as well.

Name: joffrey lannister
Interaction: Will you obey now? Or do you need another lesson? l'll look for you in court.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: l want to see him. Now! Leave us.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Leave us.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: You look lovely tonight, Lady Stark. Widowhood becomes you. Your bed must be lonely. ls that why you came? l'm not at my best, but l think l could be of service. You slip out of that gown and we'll see if l'm up to it. Oh, l do like a violent woman.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: l will kill you tonight, Ser. Pack your head in a box and send it to your sister.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: Let me show you how. Hit me again, over the ear. And again and again. You're stronger than you look, it shouldn't take long.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: That is what you want the world to believe, isn't it? That you don't fear death.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: But l don't, my lady. The dark is coming for all of us. Why cry about it?

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Because you are going to the deepest of the seven hells, if the gods are just.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: What gods are those? The trees your husband prayed to? Where were the trees when his head was getting chopped off? lf your gods are real and if they are just why is the world so full of injustice?

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Because of men like you.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: There are no men like me. Only me.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: My son Bran. How did he come to fall from that tower?

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: l pushed him out the window.

Name: catelyn stark
Interaction: Why?

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: I hoped the fall would kill him.

Name: jaime lannister
Interaction: You should get some sleep. lt's going to be a long war.

Name: cersei lannister
Interaction: Stop talking. Get back into bed.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: They have my son.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: They have my son! Get out, all of you. Not you. You were right about Eddard Stark. lf he were alive, we could have used him to broker a peace with Winterfell and Riverrun, which would have given us more time to deal with Robert's brothers. But now – madness. Madness and stupidity. l always thought you were a stunted fool. Perhaps l was wrong.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Half wrong. l'm new to strategy, but unless we want to be surrounded by three armies, it appears we can't stay here.

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: No one will stay here. Ser Gregor will head out with 500 riders and set the Riverland on fire from Godo s Eye to the Red Fork. The rest of us will regroup at Harrenhal. And you will go to King's Landing.

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: And do what?

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: Rule. You will serve as Hand of the King in my stead. You will bring that boy king to heel, and his mother too, if needs be. And if you get so much as a whiff of treason from any of the rest – Baelish, Varys, Pycelle…

Name: tyrion lannister
Interaction: Heads, spikes, walls. Why not my uncle? Why not anyone? Why me?

Name: tywin lannister
Interaction: You're my son. Oh, one more thing. You will not take that whore to court. Do you understand?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: l want to see him now.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: l have nothing more to fear from this woman. Go.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: Do you remember our first ride, my sun and stars? lf you are in there, if you haven't gone away, show me. You're a fighter. You've always been a fighter. l need you to fight now. l know you're very far away, but come back to me, my sun and stars.

Name: varys
Interaction: When you imagine yourself up there, how do you look? Does the crown fit? Do all the lords and ladies simper and bow, the ones who sneered at you for years?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: lt's hard for them to simper and bow without heads.

Name: varys
Interaction: A man with great ambition and no morals… l wouldn't bet against you.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: And what would you do, my friend, if you found yourself sitting up there?

Name: varys
Interaction: l must be one of the few men in this city who doesn't want to be King.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: You must be one of the few men in the city who isn't a man.

Name: varys
Interaction: Oh, you can do better than that.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: When they castrated you, did they take the pillar with the stones? l've always wondered.

Name: varys
Interaction: Have you? Do you spend a lot of time wondering what's between my legs?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: l picture a gash. Like a woman's. ls that about right?

Name: varys
Interaction: l am flattered, of course, to be pictured at all.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Must be strange for you, even after all these years… a man from another land, despised by most, feared by all.

Name: varys
Interaction: Am l? That is good to know. Do you lie awake at night fearing my gash?

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: But you carry on whispering in one king's ear and then the next. l admire you.

Name: varys
Interaction: And l admire you, Lord Baelish. A grasper from a minor House with a major talent for befriending powerful men – and women.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: A useful talent, l'm sure you'd agree.

Name: varys
Interaction: So here we stand in mutual admiration and respect.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Playing our roles.

Name: varys
Interaction: Serving a new King.

Name: petyr baelish
Interaction: Long may he reign. My king.

Name: varys
Interaction: My king.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Interaction: ls that what you fear? You will be my khalasar. l see the faces of slaves. l free you. Take off your collars. Go if you wish, no one will stop you. But if you stay it will be as brothers and sisters, as husbands and wives.
